response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its value to you, I propose an offer of $7,500 for the product. This price reflects my commitment to providing exceptional value while also ensuring a fair return on investment for us. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach an agreement that benefits both of us.", "product_price": 7500}
